Name: Jean Marc
Ingredients: 45 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Top up with Sparkling apple juice
Instructions: MUDDLE mint and ginger in base of shaker. Add next two ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with Appletiser, stir and serve with straws.
Review: Chartreuse combines well with apple, ginger and mint in this summertime drink.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly after judging a Chartreuse cocktail competition in London and realising which flavours best combine with Chartreuse. Named after my friend, the then President Directeur Général of Chartreuse.
